content.text: Hey, I am from London. What about you?
I live in New York City. I wish I lived in London!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to practice bird calls and learn more about them.
That sounds really interesting! I love to take my dog for long walks.
I love animals! I'd brag about my ability to help them and make them feel better.
That's awesome! I'd brag about my typing speed. I can type 140 words per minute.
That's really impressive! I'd like to be able to type that fast.
You can do it! It just takes practice.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
That sounds like a great way to start the day!
It is! I love the fresh air and the beautiful scenery.
Me too! I love being outside.
Me too! I wish I could spend more time outside.
You can! Just make time for it. It's good for your mental health.
I know, I know. I'll try
